JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Junior Developer for our development team
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Who are we?

We are Scandinavia's largest SSL/TLS certificate supplier and a leading provider of scalable PKI and IoT solutions for encryption, authentication, and automated certificate lifecycle management. We serve 3000+ companies of all sizes, and we have 15+ years of experience within the PKI, SSL/TLS, and certificate management business.

We are currently around 25 employees at our office at Islands Brygge, Copenhagen. We are on a growth journey, and we strive to grow the number of employees and turnover, all supported by a state-of-the-art technical CRM solution built upon Salesforce.

The Role

We are looking for a new team member to our development team. You will be part of a team of 3-5 people working on growing our IT/CRM ecosystems enabled by Salesforce. Our new team member and colleague will join the team as a junior salesforce developer. As a junior developer, you will be responsible for maintaining and developing features and products related to our CRM platform.

TRUSTZONE's new colleague should have a strong passion for computer science and a huge interest in developing IT/data ecosystems. You will join the team and assist and learn from a senior developer in the space of Salesforce.

Your Responsibilities

  • You will assist from day one in the coding and development of TRUSTZONEs CRM platform which is powered by Salesforce. This entails the use of APEX development, JAVA, Salesforce workflows, visualforce pages and Lightning Web Components.
  • In collaboration with the Salesforce team and the business, you will be involved in and responsible for testing and maintaining the existing solution.
  • You will be involved and learn about developing solutions to address any company-wide issues and making processes more efficient together with the entire TRUSTZONE team.
  • Reviewing and inspecting custom-developed code when it fails and making the necessary technical adjustments in collaboration with senior developers within the team.
  • A lot of the learning and first steps as a junior developer is responsible for producing and maintaining technical documentation of the solution.
  • As a junior developer, you will also be asked to make data extractions and queries and perform reviews and analyses of the data.


Your profile

  • You have a university degree within the field of computer science
  • You speak fluent Danish and have English professional skills
  • 2+ years of experience working in a technical environment and -Experience with development languages
  • Preferable you have experience with JAVA and/or WEB development from previous jobs
  • You are by nature persistent and curious because Salesforce Developers absolutely thrive on solving problems and believe that any repetitive task can be automated with code.
  • You have strong attention to detail and pride yourself on delivering high quality and meeting deadlines.
  • Within Salesforce development, trial and error is part of the job; hence to become a good developer, it is necessary to tenacious to become successful in your career.

We offer

A great place to work characterized by enthusiasm and "start-up energy." We have a dynamic work environment with a shared focus on professionalism, a flat organizational structure, and an informal tone.

This job also includes:

  • An attractive salary package including pension & healthcare insurance
  • Excellent and modern facilities including a healthy canteen
  • Flexible working hours in an Informal atmosphere.
  • Opportunity to influence our product and ways of working, every day.
  • Professional development in an intense and high-growth scale-up environment.
  • A team of international co-workers, all on a mission to make the world a safer place

A challenging and dynamic work environment isn't all we have to offer. When you join TRUSTZONE, you can expect:

  • access to experts in virtually every field
  • a culture that focuses on supporting our employees

Application

If you are ready to join our team. Send your application CV and other relevant documents. We process applications and arrange interviews continually, so we recommend that you apply as soon as possible.

Please do not hesitate to contact HR Manager Tine Cranil on telephone +45 20 72 88 22 or mail: tc@trustzone.com or Operations Officer Jakob Asmussen on telephone +45 25 38 83 65 or mail ja@trustzone.com if you have any questions about the position.

details.Address: Islands Brygge 41, Trustzone Trustzone,2300, København S
